Is the child sleeping under a Long Lasting Insecticide-Treated Net (LLITN)? Whether the pregnant woman sleeps under a LLITN Malaria is very dangerous for pregnant women. Wherever malaria is common, women should prevent malaria by taking anti-malarial tablets recommended by a trained health worker and by sleeping under an insecticide-treated mosquito net.
